Sentencas: Cathode poisoning, associated with Cr evaporation from interconnect material, is one of the most important degradation mechanisms in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells when Cr2O3-forming steels are used as the interconnect material.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Coating these steels with a thin Co layer has proven to decrease Cr vaporization.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To reduce production costs, it is suggested that thin metallic PVD coatings be applied to each steel strip before pressing the material into interconnect shape.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This process would enable high volume production without the need for an extra post-coating step.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, when the pre-coated material is mechanically deformed, cracks may form and lower the quality of the coating.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In the present study, Chromium volatilization is measured in an air-3% H2O environment at 850 degrees C for 336 h. Three materials coated with 600 nm Co are investigated and compared to an uncoated material.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effect of deformation is investigated on real interconnects.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Microscopy observations reveal the presence of cracks in the order of several mu m on the deformed pre-coated steel.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, upon exposure, the cracks can heal and form a continuous surface oxide rich in Co and Mn.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As an effect of the rapid healing, no increase in Cr vaporization is measured for the pre-coated material.
Titulo: Chromium vaporization from mechanically deformed pre-coated interconnects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
